author: samwilsn
content:
Spec Update #62
 - <@689161464829050960> new server is _mostly_ set up, just need to fix the raid configuration. Testing the case that was raised, and 
 - <@243183686562873344> playing with the akula server, changing how we do genesis
 - <@830368514225340436> investigating removing `ensure` to make the codecov report more useful, looking into full support for `ValidBlock` tests.
